div.h2: Welcome to the Lowndes County Schools

div.p:
The eleven schools of the Lowndes County Schools district share a common commitment to creating the best learning experiences for our over 10,500 students--We are One Lowndes!
This dedication is reflected in our Mission and Vision statements adopted in 2018 by our greater school community:

Mission:Working together to empower, challenge, and inspire - One Lowndes!
Vision:A learning community striving for excellence every day.

Our schools offer our students numerous opportunities to discover their talents and to enhance their knowledge and skills. Over 800 certified teachers, administrators, and support staff strive daily to assist all of our students along their individual journeys to meet their unique potentials.

img.alt: Logo: OneLowndes Where Everyone Finds Their future
